bcid
Class elementMinter

java.lang.Object
  bcid.GenericIdentifier
      bcid.dataGroupEncoder
          bcid.dataGroupMinter
              bcid.elementMinter
All Implemented Interfaces:
encoder, GenericIdentifierInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
manageEZID
public class elementMinter
extends dataGroupMinter

The elementMinter class brokers interactions between elements and groups and a mysql backend database. The elementMinter extends dataset and thus relies on the notion of a dataset to be in existence before creating ANY identifier.

createBCIDs

public java.lang.String createBCIDs(int numIdentifiers,
                                    java.net.URI what)
                             throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                    java.net.URISyntaxException
Create a bunch of bcids. These are not yet EZIDs but we will create a place-holder for them in our database. If the user that requests these returns to the triplifier then we will turn them into EZIDs for them at that time. As such, all that is needed to register these is an email address of a responsible party.

Parameters:
numIdentifiers -
Returns:
An ArrayList of all the GUIDs
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
java.net.URISyntaxException
